nodes.text: An unidentified Sakiyan cargo hauler was active during the Clone Wars.

This cargo hauler was present on the planet Stobar near Plop Dribble's in 21 BBY. Savage Opress came up to the Sakiyan and demanded that he take him along. The pilot agreed, most likely out of fear, to transport Savage to Lotho Minor. Upon their arrival there, to his dismay, Savage dropped him out of the ship and onto the planet. While he was alive while being dumped from the ship, his condition upon landing was never made clear.
This Sakiyan's model was the recolored model of Sixtat from The Box episode. He was voiced by James Arnold Taylor.
